column2: "Dɛm ntsi
column4: menam Nyankopɔn n'ehumbɔbɔr do serɛ hom dɛ hom ntu hom nyimpadua nsi hɔ dɛ enyikan afɔrbɔdze krɔnkrɔn a ɔsɔ Nyankopɔn enyi a ɔyɛ hom som a ntseasee wɔ mu no."

column2: "Na mma hom nnyɛ hom ho dɛ wiadze yi: na mbom hom ndua hom adwen foforyɛ mu nsakyer
column3: ama hom aasɔ Nyankopɔn pɛ no a oye na ɔsɔ enyi na odzi mu no ahwɛ."

column2: "Na menam adom a wɔdze adom me no do meka kyerɛ hom mu nyimpa biara dɛ mma ɔnndwen nntra dza ɔsɛ dɛ ɔdwen
column4: dɛ mbrɛ Nyankopɔn akyɛ gyedzi nsusui ama obiara no."

column2: "Na dɛ mbrɛ yɛwɔ nyimpadua kor yi mu mfafakuwa pii
column3: na mfafakuwa no nyina nndzi dwuma kor no

column2: "dɛmara so na hɛn a yɛdɔɔ so yi
column3: yɛyɛ nyimpadua kor wɔ Kraest mu
column4: na yɛyɛ mfafakuwa ma hɛnho nkorkor."

column2: "Na yɛwowɔ adom akyɛdze a ɔsosoree dɛ mbrɛ adom a wɔdze adom hɛn no tse no. Sɛ nkɔnhyɛ a
column3: hom mma yɛnhyɛ nkɔm dɛ mbrɛ hɛn gyedzi nsusui pa tse;"

column2: "sɛ ɔsom a
column3: yensuo hɛn som no mu dzen
column4: ɔkyerɛkyerɛfo nyɛ ne nkyerɛkyerɛ no yie
column6: "nyia otu fo nkɔ do mma afotu
column7: nyia ɔkyɛ adze mfa akomamutsewee nkyɛ

column2: "Mma hom mmfa ndabraba mfora ɔdɔ mu. Hom nkyir dza omuo na hom ntakyer dza oye ho."
"Enuadɔ mu a
column3: hom ndodɔ homho yie nkorkor; enyidzi mu a
column4: hom ndzi kan ndzidzi homho nyi;"

column2: "mbɔdzembɔ mu a
column3: mma hom nnyɛ nyaa nyaa wɔ mu; hom nyɛ sunsum mu hyew; hom nsom Ewuradze."

column2: "Hom ndzi dɛw wɔ enyidado mu; sɛ hom kɔ ahohia mu a
column3: hom nya ho abotar; hom nkɔ do araa mbɔ mpaa;"

column2: "hom mboa ahotseweefo a wɔwɔ hia mu; hom ngye ahɔho."
"Hom nhyira hɔn a wɔtseetsee hom ho: hom nhyira na mma hom nndom."
"Hom nye hɔn a wodzi dɛw ndzi dɛw; hom nye hɔn a wosu nsu."
"Hom nyina nye homho homho ntsena ntseasee mu. Mma hom mmema hom ho do
column3: na mbom hom mbrɛ homho adze mma hɔn a wɔdwe. Mma hom mmbu homho enyansafo mbordo."

column2: "Mma hom mmfa bɔn nntua obiara bɔn kaw. Hom ndwen dza ɔyɛ enyidzi wɔ nyimpa nyina enyim."
"Sɛ ɔbɛyɛ a
column4: hom nye nyimpa nyina ntsena asomdwee mu."

column2: "Adɔfo
column4: na mbom hom ngyaa biribiara nhyɛ Nyankopɔn n'ebufuw nsa: osiandɛ wɔakyerɛw no dɛ
column5: Awerdzi dzi wɔ me: emi na mubotua kaw

column2: "Dɛm ntsi sɛ kɔm dze wo tamfo a
column3: ma no edziban; sɛ nsukɔm dze no a
column4: ma no biribi ma ɔnnom: osiandɛ sɛ eyɛ dɛm a

column2: "Mma bɔn nndzi hom do nyim
column3: na mbom hom mfa papa ndzi nyim wɔ bɔn do."
